description: Date change for Motherwell v Hibs
title: Date change for Motherwell v Hibs
title_page:
Date change for Motherwell v Hibs
 - BBC Sport
maintext:
The Premiership game between Motherwell and Hibs next weekend has been pushed back 24 hours because of the Easter Road side's European involvement.
The fixture at Fir Park will now take place at 15:00 BST on Sunday, 13 August.
Hibs host Switzerland's Luzern in the first leg of their Europa Conference League third-round qualifier on Thursday, 10 August.
